content.rendered:
National Finals Rodeo is scheduled for December 5-14, 2024 at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas. The Wrangler NFR is an event you should attend at least once in your life. The Wrangler NFR will return to the Thomas & Mack Center December 5-14, marking the 38th year the Wrangler NFR will be held in Las Vegas.

NFR Event Schedule 2024 (NFR 9 TO 5)

WRANGLER NFR 9 TO 5

SUNDAY, DECEMBER 1

Miss Rodeo America — Contestant Official Introductions

  • 9:30 a.m. — Doors open to the public
  • 10 a.m. — 11:30 a.m. — Official introductions and visit with Miss Rodeo America
  • South Point Showroom
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

MONDAY, DECEMBER 2

PRCA National Convention (Registration Available)

  • 12 p.m. — 4 p.m.
  • Early Registration and Contract Personnel Trade Show Set Up
  • South Point Convention Area & Exhibit Hall

TUESDAY, DECEMBER 3

PRCA National Convention (Registration Available)

  • 7 a.m. — 4 p.m.
  • South Point Convention Area

Miss Rodeo America — Horsemanship Competition sponsored by AQHA and Waddell & Reed

  • 7:30 a.m. — Doors open to the public
  • 8 a.m. — 12:30 p.m.
  • South Point Priefert Pavilion and Arena
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

PRCA General Session

  • 8 a.m. — 10 a.m.
  • South Point Ballroom

South Point Western Gift Show

  • November 29 and 30 from 9 a.m. — 6 p.m.
  • South Point Exhibit Hall
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

PRCA Breakout Sessions

  • 10 a.m. — 12 p.m.
  • South Point Ballroom

PRCA National Convention Contract Personnel Trade Show & JCCF Silent Auction

  • 12:30 p.m. — 4:30 p.m.
  • South Point Exhibit Hall
  • Convention Attendees Only

National Finals Breakaway Roping

  • 2 p.m.
  • South Point Arena and Equestrian Center
  • Ticket Required
  • Tickets available at South Point Box Office 702-797-8055

WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 4

PRCA National Convention (Registration Available)

  • 7 a.m. — 4 p.m.
  • South Point Convention Area

Miss Rodeo America — Public Speaking/Extemporaneous Speeches

  • 7:30 a.m. — Doors open
  • 8 a.m. — 10 a.m. — Speeches/Public speaking
  • South Point Showroom
  • Ticket Required
  • For more information, visit www.sportdown.com

PRCA General Session

  • 8 a.m. — 10 a.m.
  • South Point Ballroom

PRCA Breakout Sessions

  • 10 a.m. — 12 p.m.
  • South Point Ballroom

PRCA National Convention Contract Personnel Trade Show & JCCF Silent Auction

  • 12:30 p.m. — 4:30 p.m.
  • 12 p.m. — JCCF Silent Auction
  • 3 p.m. — JCCF Auction Ends & Check-Out
  • South Point Exhibit Hall
  • Convention Attendees Only

Rodeo Royalty Seminar

  • 1 p.m. — 5 p.m.
  • South Point Hotel, Casino and Spa — Bowling Plaza Room A
  • Ticket Required
  • For more information, visit www.missrodeoamerica.com

National Finals Breakaway Roping

  • 2 p.m.
  • South Point Arena and Equestrian Center
  • Ticket Required
  • Tickets available at South Point Box Office 702-797-8055 or southpointarena.com

THURSDAY, DECEMBER 5

ALL IN Barrel Race

  • ALL IN Race 1 — December 1 — 3
  • ALL IN Breakaway — December 4 — 6
  • ALL IN Race 2 — December 7 — 11
  • Start times vary by day
  • The Orleans Arena
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit www.LVBarrelRace.com

PRCA National Convention (Registration Available)

  • 8 a.m. — 12 p.m.
  • South Point Convention Area

PRCA National Convention Contract Personnel Trade Show

  • 9 a.m. — 12 p.m.
  • South Point Exhibit Hall
  • Open to the Public

YETI Junior World Finals

  • 9 a.m. — 3 p.m.
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Wrangler Rodeo Arena
  • Bull Riding, Bareback and Saddle Bronc
  • Ticket Required

The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas — It’s All Here

  • 9 a.m. — 4 p.m.
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • **Co-located with the RMEF Hunter & Outdoor Christmas Expo

2024 Benny Binion’s World Famous Wrangler NFR Bucking Horse & Bull Sale

  • Doors open at 9 a.m.
  • UBHA — 2 and 3-Year-Old Colt Finals
  • South Point Arena & Equestrian Center
  • Ticket Required
  • Tickets available at South Point Box Office 702-797-8055 or www.sportdown.com

Cinch Western Gift Show

  • Open daily December 1 — 11 from 9 a.m. — 6 p.m.
  • South Point Exhibit Hall
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Cowboy Marketplace Gift Show

  • Open daily December 1 — 10 from 10 a.m. — 5 p.m.
  • Mandalay Bay Convention Center
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Country Christmas

  • Open daily December 1 — 11 from 10 a.m. — 5 p.m.
  • Rio Las Vegas
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

RMEF Calcutta

  • 10:15 a.m. — 11 a.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Miss Rodeo America PRCA Luncheon sponsored by Greeley Stampede

  • Doors open at 10:30 a.m.
  • 11:30 a.m. — 2 p.m.
  • South Point Hotel, Casino and Spa — Sonoma Room
  • Ticket Required
  • Wrangler NFR Luncheon w/Stock Contractors, Rodeo Committees, Rodeo Impromptu Questions by MRAP Contestants
  • For more information, visit www.sportdown.com

PRCA Permit Member of the Year Challenge

  • 11 a.m. — Permit Member of the Year Challenge with live bucking horse sale
  • South Point Arena & Equestrian Center
  • Ticket Required
  • Tickets available at South Point Box Office 702-797-8055 or www.sportdown.com

Cowboy Revival with host Shane Minor

  • 11:15 a.m. — 12:15 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

WPRA Star Celebration

  • 11:30 a.m. — 2:30 p.m.
  • South Point Grand Ballroom
  • Ticket Required – Contact the WPRA office at 719-447-4627 for details

Outside the Barrel with Flint Rasmussen

  • 12:30 p.m. — 1:30 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

NFR Tailgate Party

  • 1:30 p.m. — 4 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

FRIDAY, DECEMBER 6

YETI Junior World Finals

  • 9 a.m. — 3 p.m.
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Wrangler Rodeo Arena
  • Bull Riding, Bareback and Saddle Bronc
  • Ticket Required

The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas — It’s All Here

  • 9 a.m. — 4 p.m.
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • **Co-located with the RMEF Hunter & Outdoor Christmas Expo

Stace Smith World Bronc Futurity Finale

  • Doors open at 9 a.m.
  • 10 a.m. — Finale starts; Featuring top 4 & 5 year saddle bronc horses in North America
  • Video sale (in the arena) to immediately follow the Futurity
    South Point Arena & Equestrian Center
  • Ticket Required
  • Tickets are available at South Point Box Office 702-797-8055 or southpointarena.com ($15 in advance and $20 at the door)

RMEF Calcutta

  • 10:15 a.m. — 11 a.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Miss Rodeo America Pageant — Fashion Show Luncheon

  • 10:45 a.m. — Doors open
  • 11:30 a.m. — 2 p.m. — Fashion Show and Luncheon
    South Point Hotel, Casino and Spa — Grand Ballroom
  • Ticket Required
  • For more information, visit www.missrodeoamerica.com and click on PAGEANT

Wrangler NFR Autograph Session — Barrel Racers

  • 11 a.m. — 1 p.m.
  • Golden Nugget — The Grand Event Center Foyer
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • First come/first served; contestants depart at 1 p.m.

Cowboy Revival with host Shane Minor

  • 11:15 a.m. — 12:15 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Outside the Barrel with Flint Rasmussen

  • 12:30 p.m. — 1:30 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

NFR Tailgate Party

  • 1:30 p.m. — 4 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

2024 Bullfighters Only Las Vegas Championships

  • December 2-3, 8-10
  • 1:30 p.m.
  • Resorts World Las Vegas
  • Ticket Required
  • For more information, visit www.BullFightersOnly.com

SATURDAY, DECEMBER 7

  • Free admission/Open to the Public

YETI Junior World Finals
